author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Netflix has been home to one particular beloved series since 2020. Now, five years later, it’s been announced that the series will be moving to another streaming platform. The series will officially be making the move from Netflix to Disney Plus. With that said, viewers will still have an opportunity to watch this particular series [...]

The post Beloved Netflix Series Moving To Disney Plus appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Beloved Netflix Series Moving To Disney Plus

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Actor Jason Isaacs starred in the Harry Potter movie franchise as Lucius Malfoy. Now the iconic story is being retold once again, albeit for television, and with a new cast attached. One of these cast members, Paapa Essiedu, has been the subject of backlash for being a black actor playing Severus Snape, a character formerly [...]

The post Jason Isaacs Calls Out “Racist” ‘Harry Potter’ Fans Over Paapa Essiedu Complaints appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Jason Isaacs Calls Out “Racist” ‘Harry Potter’ Fans Over Paapa Essiedu Complaints

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
WWE Superstar Liv Morgan was recently the subject of a joke during WWE Raw, and as a result of their stunt, the wrestling organization is facing backlash. Specifically, they confused viewers and prompted the backlash by making it appear as though Liv Morgan died. Naturally, viewers were quite upset by the thought, but Morgan is [...]

The post WWE Faces Backlash After Suggesting Liv Morgan Was Dead appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: WWE Faces Backlash After Suggesting Liv Morgan Was Dead

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The 1998 buddy cop action comedy Rush Hour is nearly thirty years old. The world has changed quite a bit since its release near the tail-end of the 1990s, and now Rush Hour has been given a trigger warning as a result. The usage of trigger warnings has become more popular in recent years as [...]
